Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Goodness, what happened? You're bleeding!
Come on, you need to get that looked at right
away.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I, um...I tripped and fell. But I-I'm fine. I can still
walk...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What are you saying? You came here because
you're hurt, right? I'm taking you in and you're
getting that treated.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don't worry, the doctor here is quite skilled. It
won't hurt at all when he examines you, I
promise.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not one bit. And besides, you're a brave boy,
right Lutz? You can handle this, just like you
handled that little scrape.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's going to be fine. Come on, let's go pay the
doctor a visit.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Children are so cute. When I told Lutz he was a
brave boy, he was scrunching up his face, trying
his best to be tough.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But I do hope he'll be all right. As I know all too
well, Angela can be rather strict.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lutz, I've disinfected your cut and put some
ointment on it, but you still shouldn't move
around too much. Got it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done, Lutz. Top marks in bravery for you!
Run along home now.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's good. Lutz just tripped and skinned his
knee. It happens to kids all the time. We've both
been there, I'm sure.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My mother's a big softie when it comes to
children. She's always strict with work, but
when she sees a kid, I think it relaxes her a little.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>She's a really nice and caring woman, but her
job necessitates she be brusque and
businesslike.
<PAGE>
I hope you and her get along, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What are you two doing, standing around chit-
chatting? You're on the clock at work, Angela.
You ought to return to your duties.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
See? She's back in her "serious business" mode.
See you later.
